articles.author: Will Fenton
articles.title: A year later, the end to the pandemic lies in sharing the vaccine technology - Oxfam America
articles.description: Despite investing billions of taxpayer dollars in the development of COVID-19 vaccines, we find ourselves at the mercy of corporations that have monopoly control over the life-saving technologies everyone in the world needs.
articles.content:
Post by Will Fenton and Laura Rusu
A year ago today, Sarah Lindsay, an ICU nurse in New York City, became the first person in the United States to receive a COVID-19 vaccine outside of a trial. Gett… [+5325 chars]
